sub_title: Production Strategist - Optimising marketing production and processes - Available as (freelance) Digital Integrated Producer and Product Owner
summary:
I describe myself as being digital agnostic. My expertise comes from 15 digital years, of which the last 12 being an integrated (executive) producer on projects with a strong focus on (digital) interaction or experiences. I see myself different from your average consultant as without having hands on experience, a clear understanding of Goals & Ambitions is the hardest thing. Especially if you combine a process or ways of working with deadlines, budget, external agencies, interdependencies between internal departments and simple manpower.

About Dot Connectors:
We optimise and organise your digital and asset production, resulting in a production method applying to all of your touchpoints. From photography and linear video to digital platforms. 

We are Production Strategists, connecting the dots in digital and asset production between people, companies and projects. Not from a textbook, but from 15 years+ hands-on experience. That’s why we started in 2016. 

We provide Production Strategists & Production Consultants who are seasoned experts in marketing production. Besides advising you, we work side-by-side with your team in the roll-out.

awards.title: Base - PhoneAdress
awards.description:
Awarded with: 
- Cannes Cyber Lions / Silver Mobile Lion

A new service turning your phone into an address.

http://www.ddb.be/work/BASE/phone-address/

awards.title: Canon - Gig App
awards.description:
Multiple awards, nominations and mentions:
- Cannes Cyber Lions / Silver Promo & Activation Lion + Bronze Mobile Lion

We all wish we could take better pictures at concerts. Unfortunately all we've got is our phone cameras and they're useless. The Canon Gig App changes all that..

http://grey.com/emea/work/key/canon-gig-app/id/5921/

awards.title: Christie's - The Art People
awards.description:
Awarded with:
- Cannes Cyber Lions / Bronze – Craft: Use/Curation of Image(s)

The Art People’ replaces a cold focus on the transaction with a richer landscape of people and their love affair for inanimate objects. Instead of just telling a wealthy few how they can purchase an important piece of art, we’re engaging with a much broader audience, encouraging them to see Christie’s as a vibrant hub of the art world.

http://www.bartleboglehegarty.com/london/work/the-art-people/

awards.title: GMC – Incredible Thinking Starts Here
awards.description:
Multiple awards, nominations and mentions:
- FWA / Mobile of the Day
- FWA / Site of the Day
- Awwwards / Site of the Day
- CSS Awards / Site of the Day

Not just another scrolling website. This fine piece of HTML5 lets you explore the incredible thinking that went into the 2014 Sierra in every dimension. Brace for Hollywood-like impact and context-based interaction. 

http://www.thefwa.com/site/gmc-incredible-thinking-starts-here

awards.title: Google – Nightwalk in Marseille
awards.description:
Multiple awards, nominations and mentions:
- Webby 2015 - Technical Achievement
- Cannes Cyber Lions / Silver – Craft: Storytelling + Bronze – Craft: Interface & Navigation
- Epica Awards / Grand Prix Digital + Gold Epica - Mobile Sites + Bronze Epica - Branded content & Entertainment
- Eurobest / Gold Eurobest Interactive
- Shots Awards / Digital Campaign of the Year
- Ciclope Festival / Gold - Digital: Web Design
- Lovie Awards / Silver Lovie - Mobile: Best User Experience
- FWA / Mobile of the Day / Site of the Day
- Awwwards – Site of the Day

Google's Digital Night Walk lets you experience the sights, sounds and soul of Marseille. Immerse yourself in Cours Julien as audio and interaction guides you through the culture, cooking and street-art on display.

http://www.thefwa.com/site/google-s-night-walk-in-marseille

awards.title: Snickers - Yu Cant Spel Properlie Wen Hungrie
awards.description:
Multiple awards, nominations and mentions:
- Creative Circle Award - Gold 
- Online FAB Award
- Festival of Media Award - Silver
- Festival of Media Award - Gold 

Making mistakes when you’re hungry is very common, and misspelling words when searching online is one of the most common mistakes people make. There are more than 10 million misspelled searches every day – so this as a good way to convey the key message to a large number of people, but target them in the perfect mindset to take the hunger message on board.

awards.title: TedX AMS - The Human CLock
awards.description:
Multiple awards, nominations and mentions:
- FWA / Mobile of the Day
- FWA / Site of the Day

The Human Clock is an ever-evolving experiment that aims to ‘unite the world in time’ with a crowdsourced clock consisting of almost a hundred thousand faces. Contribute your second and claim your frame of fame.

http://www.thefwa.com/site/tedxamsterdam-the-human-clock

awards.title: Axe – Apollo Space Academy & Click farm
awards.description:
Multiple awards, nominations and mentions:
- Cannes Cyber Lions / Gold (Axe - Apollo Campaign) - Best Integrated Campaign Led by Promotion and Activation
- Cannes Cyber Lions / Silver (Axe - Apollo Campaign) - Best New Product Launch/Re-Launch or Multi-Product Promotion
- Cannes Cyber Lions / Bronze (Axe - ClickFarm) - Best Use of Games 
- D&AD / In-Book Mention
- D&AD Nomination

AXE is a deodorant brand famous for giving guys an edge with girls. In 2013, AXE launched it's most ambitious campaign yet - the AXE Apollo Space Academy, a global competition to send normal guys into space. Yes. Actual space. The campaign idea 'leave a man, come back a hero' promised that when it comes to attracting girls, nothing beats an astronaut. 

The integrated, multichannel campaign spans over 90 AXE markets and will run for over a year. During this time, guys will encounter legendary astronaut Buzz Aldrin, epic advertising, a digital hub, a global Space Camp to train the best recruits, and of course, the lucky guys will win the trip of a lifetime. Space.

awards.title: British Airways – Ticket Giveaway
awards.description:
Multiple awards, nominations and mentions:
- Google / Creative Sandbox submission 
- FWA / Site of the Day
- Lovie Awards / Shortlist

London’s Gatwick Airport is not known for its variety of exotic destinations. To change this perception, we brought Gatwick Airport to London's Victoria Train Station. Visitors were given the opportunity to win two pairs of flight tickets to impressive destinations every 15 minutes by landing a Boeing 777 with an arcade-style flight simulator. A total of 632 tickets were given away to seven exotic locations. More about this project.

http://www.google.co.uk/think/campaigns/british-airways-ticket-giveaway.html

awards.title: Audi – The new A3
awards.description:
Multiple awards, nominations and mentions:
- FWA / Mobile of the Day

A fully responsive site for the new Audi A3 that keeps to the "Everything you need, nothing you don't" mantra of the car itself. Showcases the cars key features by mixing SVG animation & video. More about this project.

awards.title: Ballentines – TshirtOS
awards.description:
Multiple awards, nominees and mentions:
- Lovie Awards / Silver Lovie - Experimental & Innovation
- FWA / Mobile of the Day
- FWA / Site of the Day
- Webby Awards / Nomination (2013)
- Cannes Cyber Lions / Shortlist Innovation Awards
- Google Creative Sandbox / Feature

Wearable, shareable and a 100% cotton. Fully programmable by an iOS app and boasting a full colour 1024 pixel screen, accelerometer, headphone jack and megapixel camera, tshirtOS can do whatever you can think of. More about this project.

http://www.thefwa.com/site/ballantine-s-tshirtos
